thread.title: A++ SERVICE
thread.title_full: A++ SERVICE - Review of Saint Dominique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: edgar m
title: A++ SERVICE
text:
very pleasent experience . the room was big enought for my wife and i
the location is great close to restaurants and bars
the day we left a pretty young lady from the help desk
helped us whit our train ticket to buy it on line.. definetley i will come back
Room Tip: always eat breakfast at hotel before going outside u can save a bunch of money See more room tips
